name: Chapter 10: Breakthrough
short_description: Sarah and her group achieve a significant breakthrough in magi tech, creating devices that could change the way magic is used in everyday life.
from_prev_chapter: Sarah and her allies work on new projects.
to_next_chapter: The new inventions start gaining attention beyond the academy.

beats.long_title: Sarah and Her Allies Brainstorm New Ideas
beats.description: Sarah and her group gather in the dormitories to brainstorm potential ideas for new magi tech devices. They combine their knowledge of engineering and magic to come up with innovative concepts.
